mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sport_plan (user_id, total_sport_start, total_sport_end, total_duration, total_burn_kcal ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalSportStart}, #{totalSportEnd}, #{totalDuration}, #{totalBurnKcal})
mapper.select: SELECT *, spi.sport_category_id, sc.sport_name FROM sport_plan sp JOIN sport_plan_item spi on sp.id = spi.sport_plan_id JOIN sport_category sc on spi.sport_category_id = sc.id where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sp.*, spi.sport_start, spi.sport_end, spi.duration, spi.burn_kcal, sc.sport_name, sc.kcal FROM sport_plan sp JOIN sport_plan_item spi ON sp.id = spi.sport_plan_id JOIN sport_category sc ON sc.id = spi.sport_category_id WHERE sp.id = #{id}

SELECT sp.*, spi.sport_start, spi.sport_end, spi.duration, spi.burn_kcal, sc.sport_name, sc.kcal FROM sport_plan sp JOIN sport_plan_item spi ON sp.id = spi.sport_plan_id JOIN sport_category sc ON sc.id = spi.sport_category_id WHERE sp.user_id = #{userId}
